SEARCH
Package org.projectsw.View.GraphicalUI

Class GuiManager

java.lang.Object
org.projectsw.Util.Observable<InputMessage>
org.projectsw.View.GraphicalUI.GuiManager
public class GuiManager extends Observable<InputMessage>
The GuiManager class handles the user interface interactions, manages the game state and the communication between client and server.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a new GuiManager instance.

    • update

      public void update(ResponseMessage response)
      Updates the client based on the received response message. Executes the response if the alphanumeric ID matches the client's key or the broadcast ID.
      Parameters:
      response - the response message to process and execute

    • run

      public void run()
      Implements the connection of the player, his login (with thw correct opening-frames operations) and the lunch of the game main frame.

    • sendNickname

      public void sendNickname(String nickname)
      Sends to the server the nickname chosen by the player and waits until the response arrives, if the response is correct it notifies the right lock, if it isn't it opens the nickname frame again.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the String to send to the server as the player's nickname.

    • sendNumberOfPlayers

      public void sendNumberOfPlayers(int numberOfPlayers)
      Sends to the server the number of players chosen by the player and waits until the response arrives, triggering the right lock.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - the int to send to the server as the number of players.

    • sendLoadGameSelection

      public void sendLoadGameSelection()
      Communicates to the server that the player has chosen to load a previous game and waits until the response arrives, triggering the right lock.
